timely, compliant and commercially viable design while minimising changes
and prioritizing construction and fabrication support. 
Deliver leadership and guidance to the Company and Contractor teams, while
acting as the Company Technical Authority for Instrumentation and Controls.
Responsibilities include interfacing with the Engineering Contractor, Main

Design Institutes and Partner Technology Groups to ensure compliance with
